item.title: Hugo Plus GitHub Equals to Hello World
item.description: Objective I want to publish some content on my blog using some content generator, and I don’t want to hire a hosting. I can use Wordpress, but I prefer to use some technologies that let me know new ways of publishing content. So, I will use Hugo for this purpose. There are a lot of tools like Jekyllrb, Ghost, Grav, Pelican and more alternatives. The last step will be set up GitHub actions.
